Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Properties/lineWidth

Function
  1. FProperty lineWidth(num w)
  2. FProperty lineWidth(computedNum cw)
Description Set the width of lines and borders of figures to w. The width value may also be computed by a callback cw.
Examples 
b1 = box([size(50), lineWidth(1)]);
b2 = box([size(50), lineWidth(2)]);
b3 = box([size(50), lineWidth(3)]);
b4 = box([size(50), lineWidth(4)]);
boxes = [b1, b2, b3, b4];
render(hcat(boxes));
gives:
